Articles.Content:
Sorry if this has been suggested before, at least i couldn't find it on the sticky lists.

Theres two things i would love to see improved in the action groups:

- Staging Group -> No idea what i would need the current staging group for as it is executed on every single stage. But i would really love to have action groups for each individual stage.

- A new group "launch" that is automatically executed before launch (on load)

Yes, it has been suggested several times, but quarrellings about re-balancing a part are far more polular.

for example my offer:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90802-Hierarchic-order-of-command-modules?p=1355086#post1355086
